Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires non-for-profit corporations to submit a questionnaire on pending wage dispute claims prior to receiving state funding
Summary: Requires not-for-profit corporations to submit a questionnaire developed by the department of state on pending wage dispute claims prior to receiving state funding.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the not-for-profit corporation law, in relation to requiring not-for-profit corporations to submit a questionnaire on pending wage dispute claims prior to receiving state funding
